metadata.name: Suspicious File Execution From Internet Hosted WebDav Share
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of the "net use" command to mount a WebDAV server and then immediately execute some content in it. As seen being used in malicious LNK files

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('cmd.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' net use http')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('& start /b ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\davwwwroot\\')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bat ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbs ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ps1 '))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of the "net use" command to mount a WebDAV server and then immediately execute some content in it. As seen being used in malicious LNK files
